overview:
As Founder and CEO of Genius Crowds www.geniuscrowds.com, CJ has a passion for open innovation via crowdsourcing.

Prior to GC, CJ built and successfully exited digital/content companies, including LIME, the first multiplatform green lifestyle brand, funded by Steve Caseâ€™s Revolution which sold to NASDAQ: GAIA in 2007 and Sunbow Entertainment which was sold to Sony Music. She also developed and led businesses at major media companies including Oxygen, Sony, and MTV as well as publicly-held Travelzoo and private equity fund, Solera Capital. CJ serves on the Board as an Advisor to several early stage companies and as Vice Chair of Healthychild.org.
